# buttonTitle(at:)

**Instance Method**

Returns the title of the button at the given index.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func buttonTitle(at buttonIndex: Int) -> String?
```

## Parameters

- **buttonIndex**: The index of the button. The button indices start at `0`.

## Return Value

The title of the button specified by index `buttonIndex`.

## Configuring buttons

- **addButton(withTitle:)**: Adds a button to the receiver with the given title.
- **numberOfButtons**: The number of buttons on the alert view.
- **textField(at:)**: Returns the text field at the given index
- **cancelButtonIndex**: The index number of the cancel button.
- **firstOtherButtonIndex**: The index of the first other button.
